name: Bosch Laser Distance Measurer Pro - Precision measurement with ergonomic grip
description: The Bosch Digital Laser Distance Measurer uses precision laser-measuring technology to provide precise measurement of length, area and volume. The continuous-length mode automatically adjusts measurements when walking off distances and this measurer features an ergonomic grip for comfort.Measuring reference points on the back and the front of the tool offer flexibilityLaser beam points and measures for precise measurementsContinuous-length mode automatically adjusts measurements when walking off distancesMeasures in inches, feet and inches, decimal feet and metric units for convenient conversionsNote: product may vary by storeHome Depot Protection Plan:Great solution for range meter measurement modes
